question: What to Donate?
answer: One can donate money, items, tools, expertise, Scholarship programs

question: How much of my donation is going directly to people in need?
answer: Your donations will go directly to people in need (children, youth, women,) and development of facilities such as building more classrooms, toilets, buying animals, stick, agricultural tools and land purchasing

question: How will my donation be used?
answer: Your donation will be used for helping the needy, initiating more economic activities, development of projects in building classrooms, centers, purchasing land, school items ,food, agricultural tools

question: I don't have much money. Can I still help?
answer: Yes, you can help by donating the minimum, volunteering or lending your expertise on an interested area of our projects

question: What are the methods of payment?
answer: Cash or mobile Money transfers, Bank transfer, Credit cards, Cheque, Visa and MasterCards

question: CIDI and WASH  Program?
answer: CIDI works in partnership with WASH program to provide clean water and sanitation to the community
